snippet: Officials discovered firearms in a Seagoville, Tex., storage unit linked to a former justice of the peace who lost a legal fight with two prosecutors who were killed.
abstract: Officials discover stockpile of firearms in Seagoville, Tex, storage unit linked to former justice of peace Eric Lyle Williams, who lost bitter legal battle with two slain Kaufman County prosecutors Mike McLelland and Mark E Hass.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and SERGE F. KOVALESKI

lead_paragraph: Officials discovered firearms in a Seagoville, Tex., storage unit linked to a former justice of the peace who lost a legal fight with two prosecutors who were killed.

headline.seo: Gun Stockpile Found in Inquiry of Slain Texas Prosecutors
headline.main: Stockpile of Guns Is Found in Texas Murder Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Stockpile of Guns Is Found in Texas Murder Inquiry
